items.title: How To Run Your Business Website and Manage Your Web Vendors
items.headline: Get a proven game plan to turn any website into the Star Performer of the Marketing Team. Even if you are techno-phobic!

A step-by-step tactical game plan to combine the website, email, social media, and SEO into one cohesive kick-ass marketing team.
The know-how to use the basic website management process to manage the work of your IT people, copywriters, and designers.
